metadata.description: UTN-Tracker Statistics API - Returns available statistics and their definitions

stats.name: Horas semanales
stats.description: Total weekly hours for subjects currently in progress (not approved, promoted, regularized, or failed)

stats.name: Promedio
stats.description: Average grade of approved and promoted subjects

stats.name: Materias aprobadas
stats.description: Number of approved subjects out of total required (including electives)

stats.name: Finales pendientes
stats.description: Number of subjects that are regularized and pending final exam

stats.name: Materias que pueden cursarse
stats.description: Number of subjects available to start based on fulfilled requirements

stats.name: Materias en condición de promoción
stats.description: Number of subjects currently in condition to be promoted (both first partials >= 8)

stats.name: Materias a recuperar
stats.description: Number of subjects that require recovery exams

stats.name: Cantidad de materias desaprobadas
stats.description: Number of subjects that have been failed

stats.name: Años de antigüedad
stats.description: Years since starting the degree program

stats.name: Peso académico
stats.description: Academic weight calculated as: 11 * Approved - 5 * Years - 3 * Failed
